abstract.p: Alcan Aluminium of Canada reports 25 percent increase in third-quarter operating profit, to $147 million; final profit was $181 million (S)

block.p: Alcan Aluminium of Canada reported a 25 percent increase in third-quarter operating profit, to $147 million, or 69 cents a share, meeting the consensus estimate of analysts surveyed by First Call/Thomson Financial. Including nonoperating gains of $34 million, or 16 cents a share, final profit was $181 million, or 85 cents a share. The president and chief executive, Jacques Bougie, said that despite weaker demand for some products, prices remained firm.

The president and chief executive, Jacques Bougie, said that despite weaker demand for some products, prices remained firm.
